task.title: List Pitch
task.shortdesc: List pitch values from the Speech Analysis view.

context.p: A pitch listing can be obtained from the Speech Analysis view. To print a pitch listing use the following procedure.

step.cmd: (Optional) Make a selection in the Speech Analysis view.
From the Praat menu in the Speech Analysis view, select Pitch listing .

step.note: Options for pitch listings can be changed through the Pitch settings window.
step.cmd: The list of pitch values will be displayed in a new Buffers window for the audio segment/selection.
